facts.text: I'm one of the most famous designer clownfish ever! My lightning bolt pattern started from a single wild-caught fish in Papua New Guinea.
The original Lightning Maroon was caught in 2010 and breeders worked for years to reproduce my electric pattern!
I can be more feisty than other clownfish - maroons are known for our big personalities and we can be a bit territorial!

profile.diet: Pellets, frozen mysis shrimp, and brine shrimp
